content: project level easy description dress up your succulent planters with this sweet plant hanger this pattern is worked in one continuous piece from the bottom up no sewing required specifics measurements fits a 4 diameter planter gauge 1 = 5 single_crochet sts hook size 4 5mm other tools tapestry needle scissors yarn weight medium 4 yarn used darn good yarn worsted weight silk - pattern is written in standard us crochet terms - the pdf listed for sale contains the full pattern - please note all sales are final on digital items no refunds will be made view my blog to see more of my patterns www thenicolechase com pattern copyright © 2021 nicole chase all rights reserved pattern may not be altered copied redistributed or sold as your own pattern you may sell the finished product on a small scale pattern/design credit given to www thenicolechase com is appreciated permission to sell does not include mass production large scale production is prohibited photography copyright © 2021 nicole chase all rights reserved photos may not be altered copied redistributed or sold as your own
